column4: bobby i used to run this on edgy a day ago with the open source radeon driver
Well i am really shocked at the slowness of gnome redrawing my desktop with icons on it
hmm, everytime you hit f5 it just chugs?
its weird: if i do hard redraw thing on the desktop like moving windows around fast then reverting immediately to an empty desktop make the desktop icon redrawing choke
i have a clean edgy install - well i had beryl and uninstalled it and also played with the gcong setting regarding metacity performance features.
well a backup is out of the question i am afraid
how about getting a clean gcong off your install cd?
er..... I assume there's a gcong.conf file somewhere in the .metacity folder if you can access that - it should be clean
i have been told many times never to mess with a working linux box :-)
rubbish, if it's not broken, tweak it
that was definately not my opinion ! Any other alternatives for icon placement ? I see many docks in screenshots like mac osx dock
sorry, I don't use docks. Check the repos?
